scripts.start:local: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port 35355 --signal-port 35356" "BOOTSTRAP_PORT=35355 SIGNAL_PORT=35356 npm run start"
scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet && concurrently -k "npm run start:ui" "cross-env ADMIN_PORT=10002 npm run start:agent"
scripts.network:local: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port 35355 --signal-port 35356" "BOOTSTRAP_PORT=35355 SIGNAL_PORT=35356 npm run network"
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet && concurrently "npm run start:ui" "cross-env ADMIN_PORT=10001 npm run start:agent" "cross-env DISABLE_DEEP_LINK=true ADMIN_PORT=10002 npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:ui: concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet" "npm run start -w we-alpha"
scripts.tauri:dev: cross-env RUST_LOG=info WASM_LOG=warn npm run tauri dev -- -- -- --profile ${ADMIN_PORT}
scripts.build:ui: npm run build:libs && npm run build -w applet-iframe && npm run build -w we-alpha
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.e2e: npm run build:happ && cargo build --release -p we && npm test -w e2e-tests
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack ./workdir --recursive
scripts.build:example: npm run build:libs && npm run build:zomes && npm run package -w example-applet && rimraf testing-applets/example-applet && cp example/workdir/example-applet.webhapp testing-applets
scripts.build:ex: npm run package -w example-applet && cp example/workdir/example-applet.webhapp testing-applets/$NAME.webhapp
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run download:devhub && npm run download:appstore
